page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: {Recreation}is exclusively based on outdoor activities. 1.Recreation Grounds:-two exist (a) N.Stoke-football (b) Wallingford-cricket 2.Footpaths and bridleways-14km of public rights of way exist.Most important is"The Ridgeway"one of Britains long distance footpaths also the "Icknield Way" 3.River Thames-varied use is made of this, plesure boating,fishing ,rowing ,sailing,canoeing,swimming,walking and picnicing beside the river.On a june day an average 150 boats would use this stretch. 4. Other activities-include walking,cycling,riding(stables at Blenheim farm)and observation of wildlife.
